title: Nice
text:
Last Saturday I visit this beautiful place paradise on earth.
The people came from all around the world.

title: Best of Best indian food in Athens
text:
I want to describe my review about Indian haveli, Due to lockdown situation we make an delivery near Holton area.
We found same quality which we get when we dine in restaurant.
The food was hot and came very fast.

title: Satisfied prices and amazing taste
text: We order chicken tikka masala ,dal makhni,chicken tikka with garlic and mix chilly naan all are tasty and fresh food.its my 6th order to haveli indian restaurant. Before covid every weekend we enjoy there and staff also very helpful thanks to INDIAN HAVELI .

title: Excellent Delivery Service.
text:
Actually, We are regular customer of Indian Haveli restaurant.
But due to lockdown we regularly ordered delivery. All the time we found delicious Indian food.
We love chicken korma with khandari nan and mango lassi. Of course papadam as usually.

title: Excellent food and service
text:
We love indian food. So we regularly choose indian haveli.
All the time we found good food at Haveli.
Must try butter chicken with garlic naan.

title: Best Indian Meal near Acropolis stations
text:
Best Indian Meal near Acropolis stations.
We ordered chicken Tikka and pulao rice and in sweet gulab jamun.
All of them amaging.

title: Delicius indian food and fast service
text:
Delicius indian food and fast service.
We live in Athens and usually we visit this restaurant once a month.
one reason we go usually because they use real spices as like india.
price is normal for a couple 20-25 euro.

title: Good food and great staff
text:
I visit that restaurant second time.
everything was good. Food came on time. we ordered chicken tikka masala with poulao and naan.

title: origenal spicy food
text: The food was really fresh and delicus . The service was very good and frindly staff. and option have everything like jain and veg.

title: Good tour with tarka restaurent
text: The food was very deliceus and the staff was friendly and fast servise . amezing experience with indian food .

title: Best indian resturent in athens
text: it was very good food . chiken tika masala it verry nice . mango lassi my best . chiken korma also good .

title: Great Indian restaurant excellent service
text: The food was very delicious Dall makhni it was amazing with butter naan. Very well decorated Haveli.
